name: Fairily Fatal
description:
Fairily Fatal is a multiplayer FPS made during Global Game Jam 2020 under 48 hours.

Fairily Fatal is played head to head over the network so it requires two computers in order to play. It can be played both on the local network and online.

The goal of the game is to gather mana from the mana pool in the middle and return it to your tree. First to fill their tree wins!

See instructions below on how to host and join servers.

Credits:
Programming - IsacDee
Art - Manaspurt
Music/Sound - Mcfluff

Controls MovementWASD + MouseChange Weapons1, 2, 3 or Scroll WheelReturn To MenuDelete
